Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Yoodhaadhesaththil Paadappadum Paattaavadhu: Belanaana Nagaram Namakku Undu; Ratchippaiye Adharku Madhilum Aranumaaga Erpaduththuvaar.
2 saththiyaththaik Kaikkonduvarugira Needhiyulla Jaadhi Ulle Pravesippadharkaaga Vaasalgalaith Thiravungal.
3 ummai Urudhiyaaip Patrikkonda Manadhaiyudaiyavan Ummaiye Nambiyirukkirapadiyaal, Neer Avanaip Poorana Samaadhaanaththudan Kaaththukkolveer.
4 karththarai Endrendraikkum Nambungal; Karththaraagiya Yegovaa Niththiya Kanmalaiyaayirukkiraar.
5 avar Uyaraththile Vaasamaayirukkiravargalaiyum Keezhe Thallugiraar, Uyarndha Nagaraththaiyum Thaazhththugiraar; Avar Tharaimattum Thaazhththi Adhu Mannaagumattum Idiyappannuvaar.
6 kaal Adhai Midhikkum, Sirumaiyaanavargalin Kaalum Elimaiyaanavargalin Adigalume Adhai Midhikkum.
7 needhimaanudaiya Paadhai Semmaiyaayirukkiradhu; Magaa Needhipararaagiya Neer Needhimaanudaiya Paadhaiyai Semmaippaduththugireer.
8 karththaave, Ummudaiya Nyaayaththeerppugalin Vazhiyile Umakkuk Kaaththirukkirom; Umadhu Naamamum Ummai Ninaikkum Ninaivum Engal Aaththuma Vaanjaiyaayirukkiradhu.

9 en Aaththumaa Iravile Ummai Vaanjikkiradhu; Enakkul Irukkira En Aaviyaal Adhikaalaiyilum Ummaith Thedugiren; Ummudaiya Nyaayaththeerppugal Boomiyile Nadakkumpodhu Poochchakkaraththukkudigal Needhiyaik Katrukkolvaargal.
10 dhunmaarkkanukku Dhayai Seydhaalum Needhiyaik Katrukkollaan; Needhiyulla Dhesaththilum Avan Aniyaayancheydhu Karththarudaiya Magaththuvaththaik Gavaniyaadhepogiraan.

11 karththaave, Umadhu Kai Ongiyirukkiradhu, Avargal Adhaik Kaanaadhirukkiraargal; Aanaalum Umadhu Janaththukkaaga Neer Konda Vairaakkiyaththaikkandu Vetkappaduvaargal; Akkini Ummudaiya Saththurukkalaip Patchikkum.
12 karththaave, Engalukku Samaadhaanaththaik Kattalaiyiduveer; Engal Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Engalukkaaga Nadaththivarugiravar Neere.
13 engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummaiyallaamal Vere Aandavanmaar Engalai Aandaargal; Ini Ummai Maaththiram Saarndhu Ummudaiya Naamaththaip Prasthaabappaduththuvom.
14 avargal Seththavargal, Jeevikkamaattaargal; Maanda Raatchadhar Thirumba Ezhundhiraargal; Neer Avargalai Visaariththu Sangariththu, Avargal Peraiyum Azhiyappannineer.
15 indha Jaadhiyaip Perugappannineer; Karththaave, Indha Jaadhiyaip Perugappannineer; Neer Magimaippatteer, Dhesaththin Ellai Ellaavatraiyum Nedundhooraththil Thalli Vaiththeer.
16 karththaave, Nerukkaththil Ummaiththedinaargal; Ummudaiya Thandanai Avargalmelirukkaiyil Andharanga Vendudhal Seydhaargal.
17 karththaave, Perukaalam Sameebiththirukkaiyil Vedhanaippattu, Than Ambaayaththil Kooppidugira Karppavadhiyaippola, Umakku Munbaaga Irukkirom.
18 naangal Karppamaayirundhu Vedhanaippattu, Kaatraip Petravargalaippol Irukkirom; Dhesaththil Oru Ratchippaiyum Seyyamaattaadhirukkirom; Poochchakkaraththuk Kudigal Vizhugiradhumillai.

19 mariththa Ummudaiyavargal Predhamaana Ennudaiyavargalodekooda Ezhundhiruppaargal; Mannile Thangiyirukkiravargale, Vizhiththu Gembeeriyungal; Ummudaiya Pani Poondugalinmel Peyyum Panipol Irukkum; Mariththorai Boomi Purappadap Pannum.
20 en Janame, Nee Poi Un Araikkulle Pravesiththu, Un Kadhavugalaip Poottikkondu, Sinam Kadandhupogumattum Konjaneram Oliththukkol.

21 idho, Boomiyinudaiya Kudigalin Akkiramaththinimiththam Avargalai Visaarikkumpadi Karththar Thammudaiya Sthaanaththilirundhu Purappattuvaruvaar; Boomi Than Raththappazhigalai Velippaduththi, Thannidaththil Kolaiseyyappattavargalai Ini Moodaadhirukkum.
